programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.desc: Not all spirits are night owls. Some of them may be lurking around breakfast time. Second Sight wakes up with the community of Seville Quarter for a morning investigation of the paranormal during brunch hours.

programme.title: Cryptid Wilds S01 E03
programme.desc: The search for Big Foot takes these two adventures into the wilderness, as they document their journey to find the mythological creature

programme.title: Paranormal Investigator
programme.sub-title: SPINE-CHILLING Paranormal Investigation | We Had To LEAVE
programme.desc: Danny Moss is one of the leading names in the UK paranormal field. The Paranormal Investigator documents Danny's own personal joruney into the paranormal as he attempts to document compelling evidence on camera. Danny's investigation style is based on capturing both visual & audible results, he does not believe in the use of 'spiritual' or 'easily manipulated' techniques such as Ouija Boards, Table Tipping, Mediums, Pendulums, Dowsing Rods, Mirror Scrying etc...This show is for viewers who are willing to be patient and who understand the true values of paranormal investigation. More often than not, paranormal phenomena does not occurr and Danny's ethics and reputation will ensure that what you see is a TRUE reflection of the investigations conducted.

programme.title: Encounters
programme.desc: Jason investigates the haunted Margam Castle, delving into the history and ghostly tales surrounding this magnificent Gothic Structure!

programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: So Haunted The Staff Wouldn't Work Alone
programme.desc: In tonight's episode, we head out to investigate rumors of paranormal activity at the abandoned Shakespeare pub, from disembodied voices to apparitions seen walking the dark corridors, children spirits seen and heard on the staircase and something more sinister in the cellar area that has been said to scare staff or anyone who dares go down alone.

programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: Most Terrifying Paranormal Activity Caught On Camera
programme.desc: We revisit this abandoned haunted coroners court! What we captured and heard was the most terrifying poltergeist activity caught on camera!

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: Conspiracy is a video documentary series that explores the dark and controversial stories behind history's most well-known conspiracies. The series aims to take a neutral position on very polarizing topics while helping viewers uncover the truth.

programme.desc: “Unveiled” explores aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history, revealing astonishing encounters and truths.

programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: Our Night Of Terror In Haunted Mill
programme.desc: In tonight's episode, we head out to investigate The Hauntings of Warwick Mill, where it's been reported that people who venture inside end up running out in fear due to the paranormal activity within.

programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.desc: The Landmark Skate & Fun Center was abandoned years ago. But it may have a ghost-only skate after hours with nightly paranormal activity. Second Sight investigates the spirit of a child that may linger on the rink that may just contact them.
